name: Coffee&Code
description: Coffee&Code¬†format is a meetup for Android developers. It's a healthy mix of experienced developers and beginners. We come together to exchange knowledge, discuss new techniques and OS features, or simply work on our own apps and projects.

name: Android Developer Meetup
description:
If you care about runtime permissions, if you want to find out what's new in Android O, but were afraid to ask, now is the right time to come to listen and to ask by yourself.

This time the guys will tell what adventures await the Android developer who at some point decided to implement the runtime permissions into his application. But the code base of the application is already rather big. Also find out what awaits us if we want to adapt our application to a new version of SDK. All this and not only can be discovered and asked personally. We are waiting for everyone at our meetup.

The event is free but please go and register on the following link -¬†https://goo.gl/bwekgA

Agenda:

üí• Adventures to the runtime permissions world, Anton Novikov, Lead Android Developer at Viber Media¬†

Will tell about the implementation of runtime permissions in Viber App

üí• What's new in Android O, Sergey Popkov, Senior Android Developer at ScienseSoft

A story about what the new Google has prepared for developers in the new version of Android SDK.

The partner of the community is the company Social Discovery Ventures

name: Android Developer Meetup
description:
Meetup dedicated to the issues of Android-development will be held in the Minsk office of Gismart.

Topics:

1. Remote Config or how to please everyone.Let's talk about creating your own remote application configuration solution, providing A/B testing and how we put Reflection and RxJava on the service of good.

2. Our way of providing data for analytical systems.We'll tell you about our own decision to collect, store and submit parameters for analytics events and talk about how not to overload the application with analytics.

3. Kotlin: home fun! (guest report from Pavel Shchegelsky, Android developer in Ciklum)

In addition to the reports, there will be food, drinks, lots of communication and music. Other useful information you can find on facebook¬†https://www.facebook.com/events/1960983200780732/

The event is free, the number of seats is strictly limited. Registration under the link: https://goo.gl/forms/RcqagF7pRlsUcU3u2

Subscribe and follow the life of Gismart here: https://www.instagram.com/gismartmusic/

name: Android Developer Meetup
description:
We are waiting for everyone who is interested in Google technologies and API, as well as those who are already successfully implementing them in their projects.

Admission is free by prior registration - https://goo.gl/CjcXnq

Agenda:

üí• ¬†Unit-Testing of presentation layer, Vladimir Khudnitsky, Mobile Lead at Springworks AB

Vladimir will show how to build an architecture that will allow you to test the behaviour of fragments/activities using unit tests and do it quickly without waisting time

üí• ¬†Firebase: to use or not to use?, Andrei Mykamolov, ASW Systems a.s., Developer

If you want to integrate Firebase into your current project or want to start a new application based on Firebase, then you will probably be interested to know how it will behave in production and how much effort is needed for integration. The presentation will describe the most high-tech technologies provided by Firebase - Realtime Database and Cloud Functions, the cost of implementation and crutches that are born during integration, as well as several useful libraries and a real example.

The partner of the community is the company¬†Social Discovery Ventures

name: Android Developer Meetup
description:
‚Ä¢ What we'll do
On January 23, SPACE will host the GDG Minsk Meetup.

Participation is free of charge. You must fill out the registration form: https://goo.gl/GdD3he

Meetup agenda:

18:30 Register

19:00 Cyril Rozov, Android Developer, Apalon Apps
Constraint Layout. Feel the power of constraints
When I saw ConstrainLayout, I saw a wild unbridled power, but apart from it ... something truly priceless ... the new look at the creation.
Learn to control the Power of ConstraintLayout and you can create UI in Android faster and more convenient.

20:00 Cyril Shashkov, iOS Developer, Toptal (freelance)
The application of ARCore + Unity in practice
How ARCore works, the difference from Apple's ARKit. Creation of augmented reality with reference to the real world.

21:00 Networking

Partners mitapa companies Apalon and Social Discovery Ventures.

‚Ä¢ What to bring

‚Ä¢ Important to know

name: Android Developer Meetup
description:
Participation is free of charge for registration >> https://goo.gl/forms/chbjoPrWkCQhdGeC3

üìå Agenda:

‚ñ™Ô∏è How to code to code less, Anton Novikov, Lead Android Developer, Viber Media
Anton will tell you how to avoid boilerplate code with Annotation Processors and make fewer mistakes. Those who listen carefully will learn how to use their two plastic bottles and blue tape to make their Room or another library with code generation ... or at least understand how such libraries work.

‚ñ™Ô∏è General cleaning in APK, Kirill Rozov, Android developer, Apalon Apps
Did you know that in most of the world, downloading a small application can result in 5-10 minutes of waiting? And what about the fact that there is a direct relationship between the size of APK and the number of downloads? There is an exit! And you can learn about it from the report.

Date: March 27th.
Registration starts at 18.30, the beginning of the reports is 19.00.

name: Android Academy Minsk # 1: Introduction
description:
July 9 in Minsk starts Android-Academy - classes once a week, where you will get basic knowledge about Android-development:

üìåPrinciples of Activity and Fragment
üìåFeatures of constructing UI
üìåWorking with multithreading
üìåCharging network requests
üìåStorage of data on the device

By the end of the course, under the guidance of our lecturers and mentors, you will be able to create a full-fledged application!

Learn more about the course and register here >> https://eventspace-by.timepad.ru/event/743557/

description:
July 25 on the SPACE EventSpace.BY will be the next meetup of the GDG Minsk community!

Only registration is required for participation >> https://eventspace-by.timepad.ru/event/765671/

Agenda:

üìåDelivery mindset, Ivan Trifonov, SA / DM, Facemetrics

üìå Launch of a neural network on Android, Natalia Kukharchik, Android developer / Data Scientist, FLO

Partner of the event is Flo: Technology. Thanks to the company's support, we can develop and delight you with treats, videos and souvenirs.

Registration of participants starts from 18.30, the beginning at 19.00.
Venue: EventSpace.by (Oktyabrskaya Street 16/4).

name: Viber Android Meetup
description:
27th of July GDG Minsk together with Viber Media organize an Android Meetup in a new cosy Viber office.

Registration is required for participation: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe1nD0oYwQ_wu_xTLGQ0gJaCN8YfyI2R_L6gvRmnep1cYFbTg/viewform

As a confirmation we'll send you all the guides on how to get to the venue.

Agenda:

üìå Yonatan V. Levin
Google Developers Expert, Co-founder and CTO @ KolGene, Israel

¬´WTF with Android Background Restrictions¬ª

With recent Android releases, the wild west of endless running threads is over.
No more smoking barrels of "last 5% battery".
You are required to act and seriously consider how you became the excellent citizen of Android device and play side by side with a marshal law of background tasks. Or die trying.
It's a talk we will explore how memory affect a background process, what solutions we have today and how new WorkManager can save our lives and galaxy :)

üìå Yegor Malyshev, Senior Android Developer @ Viber Media.

¬´A mysterious journey to MVP world¬ª

A story full of pain and tears telling how to implement MVP for the big project with lots of legacy code and not die.

Registration: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe1nD0oYwQ_wu_xTLGQ0gJaCN8YfyI2R_L6gvRmnep1cYFbTg/viewform

Registration of participants starts at 18.00, the beginning is at 19.00.
Venue: office of Viber Media (Nemiga street, 5).

description:

To participate, be sure to register >> https://goo.gl/8eXRAx

Go

name: Special Android Academy Event
description:
Wooahaa!!

The Android Fundamentals is over! But we just started!
We are working very hard to organize an Advanced course. Meanwhile, we're very thrilled and happy to announce new meetup with 3 ‚ùóspeakers:

üìå "Android X 101" by Pavel Bogretsov, Wimix LLC

One of the biggest Android news at I/O this year was AndroidX which represents a new era for the Support Library. Pavel will dive in to show how we can migrate our projects to support this new approach. Want to know more what was exciting about this new update then come and check it.

üìå "Developing Software as a Self-employed in Belarus" by Vlad Zamskoi, Freelancer

Vlad will describe his fascinating story about the formation, design and working conditions of a freelancer. Many of us considered to be a freelancer but usually, lots of questions "how to" are raised which stops us from continuing. With Vlad, we are going to shed light on this problem and find out how he managed to resolve the issues along the way.

üìå "Fun Android Topic by our loved Yonatan Levin" by Yonatan Levin, Google Developer Expert

You know it's doesn't matter what exactly he is going to talk - it's going to be interesting :)

See you on time, we start sharp on time - 17 November, 16:00

The partner of the meetup is the company Flo: Technology. Flo is the world's fastest-growing health platform focused on women's health.

Thanks to the support of the company, we can develop and delight you with video recordings of reports, branded souvenirs.

name: GDG DevFest Belarus 2018
description:
GDG DevFest Belarus 2018 will be held on 16 of December at SPACE. The event is organized by GDG Minsk with the support of SPACE Hub (SPACE EventSpace.BY).

GDG DevFest Belarus is a community conference dedicated to web & mobile trends, as well as some other trending IT technologies.

And confirmed speakers and talks are:
‚óæÔ∏è Alexander Denisov (Senior Software Engineer @ EPAM) ‚Äì Let's fire the Flutter (RU)
‚óæÔ∏è Martin Omander (Cloud Developer Advocate @ Google) ‚Äì Building a startup's backend in 100 lines of code with Firebase
‚óæÔ∏è Gaetan Zoritchak (Kotlin early adopter, Project Lead of data2viz.io) ‚Äì Building a dataviz multiplatform library with Kotlin
‚óæÔ∏è Victor Bilyk (Senior Developer & Team Lead @ Booking.com) ‚Äì
Machine Learning @ booking.com
‚óæÔ∏è Aleksander Piotrowski (Team Lead @ Grubhub) ‚Äì How LiveData and coroutines actually work
‚óæÔ∏è Yauheni Prakopchyk (Frontend Developer @ Epicmax) ‚Äì Vue.js advice kit (RU)

name: [WTM Minsk] IWD'19 - Celebrating the Day with Inspirational Talks
description:
Join us for the Internationals Women's Day 2019 dedicated meetup Women Techmakers Minsk, which is a part of the global series of the WTM chapters all over the world.

This time the meetup will be devoted to the inspirational talks to celebrate the Day with accomplishments and inspirations.

OUR SPEAKERS:
* HANNA BANDARENKA - Diversity & Inclusion specialist at EPAM Systems (Minsk), #IamRemarkable Google initiative facilitator, Zdolnaja.by sports project for women founder.

*NASTIA ZAICEVA - Head of PR at Exp(capital) (Minsk), co-founder of @WITA.by, hosts the Instagram account about IT industry, technologies and startups.

Topics of the speakers to be posted in our WTM Minsk Facebook group (https://www.facebook.com/groups/1136914882993034/).

Schedule:

* 7pm - HANNA BANDARENKA
* 7-45pm - Coffee Pause
* 8pm - NASTIA ZAICEVA

Stay tuned ;)
